name: Gone Fishing (Eli Lavett)
description:
Gone Fishing, by Eli Lavett.

A brief interactive piece about missed conversations and missed opportunities.

Assets courtesy of Random Games, BitGem, and Acorn Bringer via the Unity Asset Store. Character model and animation from Mixamo. All other assets by me.

Music by Mountain Man. Audio by Ama and Nature Soundscapes.

Created for MA Independent Games & Playable Experience Design, UoL.

Unity URP, version 2020.2
